NewsArticle.Title: 7.10 bug fixes
NewsArticle.Content:
-Groups can now enter the boss room in the Cursed home
-Groups must all be in the same area in order to enter the doll rooms.
-The Refresh effect from the Ice Bottle will now last about 15 minutes in the Desert Dunes.
-The ability reward for the Dune Patrol quest has been increased from 1,500ap to 3,500
-The "naked" animation will be fixed with the next patch for the item shop, which will be coming very soon.
-DA Team
